title: Fountain Beta (0.5.0) is released
excerpt: Fountain is a new, state of the art, Yeoman generator. It's also, to our knowledge, the most ambitious one as it's not a generator for one technology stack but perhaps one to rule them all.

title: generator-gulp-angular 1.0.0 stable released
excerpt: Several million possibilities to simplify your Angular development using the latest tools available

title: Why (still?) Gulp
excerpt: Fountain is built on top of Gulp in an era where there is lot of other choices. Here's why!
